WFAPI::GtkDrawer

Detailed Description

Represents a GTK drawing interface.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

WFAPI::GtkDrawer::GtkDrawer ( GtkWidget *  widget  ) 

Initialize the GtkDrawer. The widget is only used to determine buffer format, size etc. No drawing to any areas is performed until renderTo is called.

Member Function Documentation

DrawingContext* WFAPI::GtkDrawer::getDrawingContext (  ) 

Returns a drawing context which can be used by MapLib to draw maps.

void WFAPI::GtkDrawer::renderTo ( GdkGC *  gc,
GdkRectangle *  rect 
)

Draws the map to a graphical context.

rect The clipping rectangle
